definition[0]: when a person, government, company etc borrows money, or the money that they borrow
definition[1]: something such as a word, phrase, or idea that has been copied from another language, book etc
example[2]: his musical borrowings from other composers
definition[2]: when a person, company, or country borrows money, or the amount of money that is borrowed
example[3]: Interest rates are low and borrowing is cheap.
example[4]: Israel relies heavily upon foreign aid and borrowing to maintain its economy.
definition[3]: the amount of money that a company or organization has borrowed
example[5]: The group has completed a refinancing programme to reduce borrowings by £5.8 million to £6.9 million.
